website_summaries.verdict: The Starry Wi-Fi Station may be the most user-friendly router ever, but it otherwise doesn't do any more than network hubs that cost half as much.
pros: The Starry Wi-Fi Station has a touchscreen that makes setting up and managing the device simple and easy
cons: It's expensive but is severely lacking in features
Its Network Health feature is largely a gimmick, and many of the router's hardware components are not activated at launch

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!  PERIOD.
customer_reviews.text: Why haven't they come up with something like this earlier! This is so simple and easy to use. I hate those other Wifi routers...this is a touchscreen and tells you everything you need to know. It tells you how much data a person is using, how fast your connection is reading, block kids from using after hours on a school night, how many devices are online etc.. It is really sweet. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G.

customer_reviews.title: Love my starry station <3
customer_reviews.text: Omg I am in LOVE with my starry station. It lives up to everything it claims to do. My internet was ALWAYS dropping. I changed routers 4 times this year. It was awful. I have wasted so much money trying to get my internet right. I was a little skeptical if this too would be a bunch of all talk no connect. But low and behold, I set it up in a few mins and have been streaming like a mother trucker. I can't say enough great things. Now I can't wait for their internet to launch. Seriously happy.
customer_reviews.author: Hudson

customer_reviews.title: It's Like a Toaster that Doesn't Get Hot
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most disappointing products I've ever purchased. 8 months in, and it's consistently bad. CONS: The range is terrible. Half the house is now not covered. The list of connected devices is NEVER right. Not once. Not ever. Pausing devices is ineffective. It's horrible at the basics, and it's completely worthless at the extras. A waste of $300.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Help for the Technologically Impaired! :)
customer_reviews.text: If you are kind of behind the times on technology as I am and you have a hard time keeping track of your home network, then this is for you! The base unit was extremely easy to set up out of the box, very easy to set up a network name and password, I hooked up all of our laptops, Smart TVs, iPads, IPhones, and Apple TV units, everything shows up on the little display, which is big enough for any one to use with ease. You can see what is on your network, how strong the signal is, etc. - I love this router, it makes things easier in general.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P. Danner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment Turned into Success. Thank You Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The replacement unit (from Amazon) was delivered in two days. This one is working fine and I am very pleased. You do not have to be a techno nerd to play with programming. It walks you through set up and it was worth the money !
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: it is a wonderful router that is very easy to use and setup
customer_reviews.text: The range on this product was just a little shy of what I needed. With that said, it is a wonderful router that is very easy to use and setup! For the average sized home, I would think most people would love this product. One item to consider is the fan noise, it is faint, but you do hear it.
customer_reviews.author: BaconBoy

customer_reviews.title: I've been using it for a good while as I was an early adopter and I've ...
customer_reviews.text: About 20 or so devices connected to my home network with Starry Station (xfinity internet, with net gear switch to handle wired connection needs). I've been using it for a good while as I was an early adopter and I've really really enjoyed it. Performs well (not perfect) but I've gotten used to it. Excellent customer service and tech support! "please call back any time!". Very friendly and super knowledgeable of the product and various setups customers may have. Solid device that continues to be supported with fairly routine updates. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian O'Conner

customer_reviews.title: MORE THAN PLEASED
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE "STARRY". IT HAS MADE MY INTERNET LIFE SOOOO MUCH BETTER. NO LONGER HAVING TO TWIDDLE MY THYMBS WAITING. I CANNOT WAIT FOR THE INTERNET TO COME ALONG. I WILL BE RIGHT ON BOARD. THANK YOU, THANK YOU AMAZON. I HAVE NEVER REGRETTED BEING A MEMBER OF AMAZON. YOU ARE JUST GREAT. HURRY WITH THE INTERNET.
customer_reviews.author: jascales

customer_reviews.title: helps to keep connected with internet is slow
customer_reviews.text: We have a very slow DSL (copper wire, ATT Phone internet) and the Starry helps to keep us connected. We still have slow speeds, but don't drop the connection like we did before. Starry helps to keep us connected with a slow signal.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L.

customer_reviews.title: It looks good, and dose good job
customer_reviews.text: I just got second router for my parents in law. It looks good, and dose good job.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED:  DO NOT RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED: It is an absolutely amazing router, that is very easy to use and manage. HOWEVER.... the fan noise is UNBEARABLE, the high pitch grates on the nerves to the point that I replaced the unit and shelved it. I would NOT recommend this unit to anyone whatsoever until they fix the MAJOR FAN PROBLEM.
customer_reviews.author: C. T. Hulbert

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Pros: simple setup nice app to monitor and control usage Good customer support Cons: Poor wifi coverage compared to other options Expensive
customer_reviews.author: sawlman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: After the setup this device is awesome. Had major issues with updating the software at 1st. But figured it out with help from the 1800 number.
customer_reviews.author: zack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. Easu to use. Really does the job! What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: David Malmberg

customer_reviews.title: Company is really eager to help and easy to get hold of.
customer_reviews.text: It has it's ups and downs, overall it helps control the kids usage some. The company really tries to help and always seems to be working on things....
customer_reviews.author: Datrooper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly easy to set up and does everything that i could expect from a wireless router.
customer_reviews.author: c forrest bannan

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy Set Up!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the easiest electronic devise I have ever had to set up and use! I seriously only had to plug it in and type in my new wifi name and password and select the time zone and it was done! To me it is worth it's weight in gold because of how easy it is to set up!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Lott

customer_reviews.title: Very low range
customer_reviews.text: Set the product up and it has to be the worst signal strength I have ever had. Rebooted it and called tech support. This is not a whole house device.
customer_reviews.author: randyr

customer_reviews.title: Best WiFi access point I've used.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent WiFi coverage, easy setup and access to info about the network, great-looking!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Chiddix

customer_reviews.title: Easiest set up ever
customer_reviews.text: Easiest router I have ever set up.. speed is much faster than the Ubee router I had from my provider..
customer_reviews.author: A.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Few minor things other than that I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working fine! It's just a router! Not a modem router combo! It only has one Ethernet output so you will need to buy a switch if you need multiple hookups! Internet phone works fine!
customer_reviews.author: get it right!

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Really cool product, and easy to set up, but the range was awful in my home. I finally gave up and bought another router after a couple of months, and now I am not allowed to return the product. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Peake

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A somewhat expensive way to keep track of your internet functioning and usage.
customer_reviews.author: Jedimind

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Worth the money. A router that's easy to setup and use.
customer_reviews.author: H. Potter Marketplace

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, but when you forget the password, you could not use some of the functions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very strong signal throughout my house and turns off wifi ...
customer_reviews.text: very strong signal throughout my house and turns off wifi when i don't want the kids on it any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Product But A Hot Potato
customer_reviews.text: Love all the info it gives you at a touch. It does get hot at the top backside. Temp gun said it reached 128°F. I was told it has a fan inside to help with this
customer_reviews.author: Dip Schitt

customer_reviews.title: aeesome
customer_reviews.text: At times she had trouble hearing her wakeup work..so moved her to an end table..we will see how it goes..
customer_reviews.author: Jackhammer

customer_reviews.title: So Far....
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Consistent connection and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: maryann rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome! I can shut the Internet down on my kids on my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is great, and it will let you know when you have a problem with your network,
customer_reviews.author: Elder Hale

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Overall this was super easy to set up and I love how easy it is to use through the app, it makes setting up parental controls simple and makes activating and deactivatin guest WiFi and password a simple flip of a switch so to speak.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Page

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far it is very impressive, it does everything it says it should.
customer_reviews.author: The Old Dude..

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! The parental controls are amazing. Easy to use.. very impressed
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: So much promise, so many problems
customer_reviews.text: Loved the concept of this router when I first read about it and the promise for device management. However, the router was nothing but problems. I went from an old Netgear router that was tried and true and all I had was failure with this router. It would tell me I had DNS problems, it would tell me the internet was slow, etc, despite never having these problems before. I was on the phone with Starry support constantly (who were great) but in the end I came to the conclusion that this product is still very flawed.
customer_reviews.author: Intaglio207

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Router!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Router!!! Very user friendly, and Very easy to set up!! Pretty high priced but so far worth it!! I recommend to everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: David &  Shannon Daniell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far very happy with the purchase!! Has improved the WIFI in my house tremendously!!
customer_reviews.author: James Black

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Would be awesome with extra ports
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Would be awesome with extra ports. Only comes with 1 but other than that it's good. Could use a little better range but I'm happy so far
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: I'm also annoyed, that the originally marketed range extender "starry wing" ...
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, the parental controls and schedule does not work. I'd give one star, but I refuse to 'hate' When a device is paused, or a bedtime rule kicks in, it stops performing dns lookups. Any connections that are already open are not interrupted. Any game in play is not interrupted. My son has managed to burn through gigbytes worth of data, a full hour after his bedtime, simply because the connection he's using does not require a DNS lookup. I'm also annoyed, that the originally marketed range extender "starry wing" still does not exist. I can add range extenders, but anything using the range extender, will not be individually distinct on the starry itself.. just the repeater. pfft.
customer_reviews.author: Marke

customer_reviews.title: Over-promised and under-delivered
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love Starry. It sounded like a wonderful concept. But. . . it's been nothing but problems. Constant IP conflicts, always said internet was slow, and there were DNS problems. Had to reset router daily (sometimes multiple times a day). After talking to customer service, nothing was resolved, and we unplugged Starry and have had no problems since.
customer_reviews.author: J. G.

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty nice, not sure why so many complaints
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty nice, not sure why so many complaints. For a 2000 SqFt home, this is perfect. The device pause feature is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Kassab

customer_reviews.title: Promise, but needs some signal improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love the display. The apps was to give me exactly what I wanted in my large home network. What they completely failed on.. the antenna are grossly underdone. Just down one flight of stairs, almost directly underneath it, would drop wifi signal/connection constantly. While the app could use some improvements, I will tell you i was impressed. Need to work on strength of signal to be better utilized in a normal house environment. Would be good for a small apartment. If they address that in the future I might buy again
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Gunther

customer_reviews.title: internal fan is too loud
customer_reviews.text: Router works well, AC is a big improvement over previous WiFi technology, but it's hard to justify the 2x premium over other AC devices. I could live with the extra cost, but the internal fan is very loud and therefore not usable in my living room where all my networking/media gear is located for my house. A well functioning WiFi device needs to be out in the open (that is Starry's intention with this beautiful design and touchscreen). Not sure who on the engineering team let this loud fan get spec'd into the product. Total bummer. I'll have to bring it to work and use it there.
customer_reviews.author: James Hanley

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know a thing about technology. That's the point. Plugged it in and have had NO problems with WiFi since. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Intermittent wifi network outages
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it in Oct, Original router didnt work, after back and forth with starry support, they sent another one. that gave me basic network, but later every time when you really need it network outages happen intermittently. range is very poor, extremely expensive router for no value. Infact i am currently writing this review on my hotspot from phone since the network is down. Router says 100%, so i dont know what else to do.
customer_reviews.author: Sada Malladi

customer_reviews.title: Good but....
customer_reviews.text: It's a different and a really disruptive product. In general works pretty well, but in my case, the device lose the internet connection showing an error that says "DNS ERROR", and this error happens every 3 or 4 hours all the time... It last in reconnect just a few minutes, somtimes even seconds, but I have had not be able to fix the error...
customer_reviews.author: Rigoberto Saenz

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I had issues with my DSL WiFi cutting out daily the provider could not diagnose, I got Starry sort of as a hail Mary and because I wanted more insight and control over my network. I love it! The internet cut out still happens though much less frequently but I love the interface, control and data it provides. Awesome router if you have the $. Even moved it next to my TV (biggest user of bandwidth in the house) because it looks sleek. Had it a month now and no issues at all. Easy setup too.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Zweig

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled by space age design
customer_reviews.text: This router has an extremely limited range. Second floor of the house got very poor signal. I ended up putting my other router back so at least the second floor got some signal at least. Very frustrated because I thought for a while about buying this expensive router and was quite bummed when it turned out to be a poor product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Allen

customer_reviews.title: Still unsure as the value of this. Doesn't seem ...
customer_reviews.text: Still unsure as the value of this. Doesn't seem to improve wifi speed, but I still need to work with it more.
customer_reviews.author: Super User

customer_reviews.title: but this is so easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: We always had trouble with our old router, but this is so easy to set up, and so far not one problem. My wife got the app for her phone, and the we received an email telling us we could set up a phone call from starry station support. We did it, and they called us. Support told us all kinds of things about their product. Really, Really like this product, and the support!!
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: starry
customer_reviews.text: so far, so good, can't wait until you get internet service, for everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Lynn Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Maybe fine for an apartment
customer_reviews.text: If they improved the range this would be a five star product. Inadequate coverage for a home. Maybe fine for an apartment.
customer_reviews.author: jeffk9

customer_reviews.title: Easy but slow!
customer_reviews.text: It runs VERY slow and you wait a long time for content to load. As for simplicity in set up goes, you can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Bobs.dad

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a keeper
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it absolutely solved my problems with monitoring & correcting issues with my internet service & its provider. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Poor signal. Non noticable improment in wi-fi in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: It has identified devices that I hadn't realized were using my wi-fi plus with the app available I can monitor with ease, nice!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: BIG MISTAKE
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a replacement for an older Apple Airport Express. We had read the reviews, and thought this would offer some nice new functions. BIG MISTAKE. This product has horrible range, less than half of the old router it replaced. More troubling is the fact it had to be shut down and restarted at least 1 time a day. We have Charter cable internet. We have never had any serious issues - but this became maddening. It is a pretty device to look at - but about as functional as a brick.
customer_reviews.author: Sean O'Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: It was so easy to set up. My son normally manages my wifi but I was able to get Starry Station set up and working on my own. I even connected my wireless printer.
customer_reviews.author: Coach130

customer_reviews.title: There is a fan. You can hear the fan like a mechanized mosquito always in the background.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about this router except the little whiny fan inside. You can hear it. You wake up, go downstairs to work before anyone stirs in the morning to get your 500 words down in the quietness of the morning. Except for the router. You can hear it like a mechanized mosquito always buzzing in the background. Just ordered another router for a replacement and will eat the cost of this one to get my solitude back. M
customer_reviews.author: M Waltone

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok.
customer_reviews.text: Less range by far than the old Apple wifi it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: David Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Not as happy with this as I thought I would be
customer_reviews.text: Not as happy with this as I thought I would be. I even find the system to be more sluggish than with my previous router. :(
customer_reviews.author: Franfreluche

customer_reviews.title: Couldnt get it to work.
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble setting mine up. Called the company and they couldnt get it set up either so I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: S/P

customer_reviews.title: Had 10 year old Linksys which worked better. Starry station was easy to set up but ...
customer_reviews.text: Had 10 year old Linksys which worked better. Starry station was easy to set up but after trial of few days it was no improvement. Would not recommend at unbelievable >$300 price. Pick any Netgear instead!
customer_reviews.author: Strato8

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. I'm pulling 20 to 30 MBS over my limit with this router... absolutely amazing. It's pricey but you get what you pay for... actually faster than directly connecting my computer to the modem???? I'm more than satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORKING
customer_reviews.text: The network got slower once I installed it. It is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: G. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Wish it worked
customer_reviews.text: I really was excited about getting this product to help extend and improve wifi signal in my home. I have an apple router in my bedroom and an extender in living room to get good signals all over a large 1-story house. I used the same set-up with Starry as my current ATT uverse router and i get the same speed and signal distance at best. It is cool looking and I wish it did work, but it did not for me. Sending it back tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: ugh
customer_reviews.text: it sucked, returned it after many attempts to get it working. my old cheap Linksys is better.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Dice

customer_reviews.title: Below average product at an above average price.
customer_reviews.text: Starry Station is completely over-hyped. It has average wifi range at best. My existing ASUS router turned out to have better range. The odd shape necessitates a LOUD cooling fan. It sounds like water running through a pipe. You'll constantly wonder if you left an outside water faucet on. The final design flaw is the sole router port. You'll need an additional switch to plug in your devices. Industry standard for wifi routers is four ports, but you won't find it with this product. Save your money...AVOID!
customer_reviews.author: Oppenheim

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement....Scam!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a router!!!!!. Total scam advertisement and no info provided for returns. This is a WiFi monitor/management tool that eats up even more bandwidth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: had to call tech support the first night. Was not compatible with my xbox. Too much work.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa C Alban

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, works great and the support staff are super.
customer_reviews.author: Ed of Anaheim Hills

product_meta.title: Starry Station - Touchscreen WiFi Router - Simple Setup and Easy Parental Controls. Fast Gigabit Speed
product_meta.description:
Style:Starry Station

With Starry WiFi, performance and simplicity go hand-in-hand. It gives you blazing-fast WiFi, tells you when there’s an issue and how to fix it, and comes with a host of other useful features to improve your home WiFi experience. Fast, reliable WiFi throughout your home, all on one seamless network. A better way to WiFi is finally here.
feature_bullets: The touchscreen router that makes fast WiFi easy to use and set up
Fast home WiFi: Better gaming, streaming and surfing.Compatibility:Works with video streamers, PCs, Macs, smartphones, tablets, and other WiFi devices; NAT, DHCP, PPPoE and IPv4
Easy WiFi Parental Controls: Block usage on certain devices with just one tap
Never Wait On Hold: Request a call directly from the touchscreen or message via the app
Automatic Updates: Overnight updates deliver new and improved product features
Know Your Speed: Auto speed checks powered by speedtest.net let you know if you get the level of internet service you pay for
Works with all internet providers, modems and service types (cable, DSL, fiber, etc.); WPA2 Encryption

specifications.Operating System: IOS, Mac OS, Windows, Android, Linux
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars265 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
